thing-type.label: Location
thing-type.description: This LWM2M Objects provide a range of device related information which can be queried by the LWM2M Server, and a device reboot and factory reset function.

channel-type.label: Latitude
channel-type.description: The decimal notation of latitude, e.g. -43.5723 [World Geodetic System 1984].

channel-type.label: Longitude
channel-type.description: The decimal notation of longitude, e.g. 153.21760 [World Geodetic System 1984].

channel-type.label: Altitude
channel-type.description: The decimal notation of altitude in meters above sea level.

channel-type.label: Uncertainty
channel-type.description: The accuracy of the position in meters.

channel-type.label: Velocity
channel-type.description: The velocity of the device as defined in 3GPP 23.032 GAD specification. This set of values may not be available if the device is static.

channel-type.label: Timestamp
channel-type.description: The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.
